Package com.igeekinc.util.pauseabort

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PauserControlleeIF  
    PauserControllerIF  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    PauseAbort  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AbortReason  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AbortedException
    AbortedException is thrown by a PauseAbort when an action is paused or aborted.
    SuspendedException
    A SuspendedException is thrown when the kSuspended reason is given to abort().
  • Error Summary 
    Error Description
    AbortedError
    AbortedError allows us to pass an AbortedException out through a call chain that has not declared itself to throw AbortedException
